title.narrative: Kenya Improved Community Security Programme (ICS) DFID Extension

description.narrative: 1. Support finalising policing aspects of the 11 County Assessment Reports and Intervention Plans. 2. Proposals for potential ICS interventions based on known or assumed NPS capacity and preparedness at county level. 3. Support finalising policing aspects of national level entry points/political economy analysis and options and recommendations for ICS interventions by identifying links between the Strategic Plan, the IG’s People Centred Policing Service transformation strategy, and opportunities in identified counties. 4. Support finalising sections of the inception report that summarise this analysis and the proposed ICS interventions - with a focus on national-county dynamics and innovation in tackling various drivers of violence (GBV, Criminal Violence, Inter-Communal violence)
Consulting days project expenses and per diems
Fees upon completion of the 16 days extension for the ICS work
